locutie.beschrijving: The preacher contrasts 'generic Easter' (nature, spring) with the 'real Easter' (Resurrection of the body). She uses Mark's ending of fear and trembling to argue against sentimentalism.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High. Focuses on the 'bald' and 'unsettling' nature of the Markan text, resisting the urge to harmonize with Matthew or Luke.

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily asserting the truth of the Resurrection against cultural and theological erosion, with a shift toward testifying and promising in the final third.
voorbeelden: I am one who testifies to the truth.
The decree has been set aside in Christ.
Resurrection means something else.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: To move the hearer from a sentimental 'spring' faith to a 'trembling' trust in the objective act of God.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Implicit. The preacher acknowledges faith as a 'gift' rather than a logical conclusion.

voorbeelden: Mark's is the most unsettling.
There is nothing in nature that could have prepared them.
The Detroit papers were full of stories.
Now don’t get me wrong.
Behold, says the Lord God.
Recognize this utterly new truth.
I delight in filling my house with flowers.
I must admit I find it startling.
I was saddened to see...
He was already creating the new conditions.
The dead shall be raised incorruptible.
He goes before you.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Strongly grounded in Scripture, but often framed as 'The Bible says' rather than 'I promise you today'.

voorbeelden: The decree has been set aside.
The Lord is risen indeed!
declaratieven.autoriteit: The preacher relies on the authority of the 'witness' rather than an ex-officio sacramental declaration.

indicatoren: Extensive 'talking about' the greeting card industry.
Long anecdotes about Grosse Pointe and Detroit.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer is well-informed and intellectually convinced but remains an observer of the 'event' until the very end.

missende_elementen: Direct address of the promise ('For you')
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: A sense of 'That is true' rather than 'This is happening to me'.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: High theological quality, but mediated through the voices of Paul and Jeremiah.
voorbeelden: In Christ shall all be made alive.
Death shall have no dominion over him.

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Direct address to visitors and the grieving.
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: Used to challenge the hearer's expectations.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Describing the women, the culture, and the greeting cards.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a 'lecture' feel in the first half.

verleden_tijd.gebruik: Historical narrative of Mark and personal travelogues.

actueel_present.gebruik: The final 'Alleluia' and the act of witnessing.

foutief_patroon.probleem: The sermon avoids moralism (Directive), which is a strength.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Assertive (The empty tomb) -> Commissive (The promise of resurrection) -> Directive (Relinquish dependence).
voorbeelden: The decree has been set aside... Relinquish our dependence.
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: The move to the Commissive is late but powerful.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: Because the decree is set aside, we can relinquish our lives.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon functions as a powerful 'testimony' (witness) that points to an objective event, but spends much time 'talking about' the lack of faith in others.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Resurrection means that something utterly new and unlooked for has been done.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The long section on greeting cards and Grosse Pointe.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It becomes an event in the final 25% when the preacher stops critiquing culture and starts testifying to the Risen Lord.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: High on truth, moderate on 'creative speaking'.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: God is the one who 'calls into existence', but the preacher acts more as a reporter of this fact.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Explicitly claimed at the end: 'That’s what the preacher is... one who testifies.'
tekstueel_bewijs: The Christian faith... is built on trust in the witnesses.

pneumatologie.geest_rol_erkend: Implicitly, as faith is called a 'gift'.
pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Yes, the preacher admits she cannot 'make' the hearer know it.
tekstueel_bewijs: It is a gift of faith.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: The sermon is treated as a 'booster rocket' to propel the hearer into a new view.
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: Strongest in the quotes from I Corinthians.
tekstueel_bewijs: The decree has been set aside in Christ.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is heavy on 'is' and 'was' (Assertive). It needs more 'I announce' and 'He gives' (Declarative/Commissive).

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: The decree has been set aside in Christ.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Today, in the hearing of this Gospel, God sets aside the decree of death for you.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Moves from a historical fact to a present event.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: Promises are often quoted as 'Paul says' rather than 'God promises you'.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Use direct address when quoting the promises.
voorbeeldzinnen: Because He is risen, you too shall be raised.

adressering_verbetering.probleem: Too much time spent on 'they' (the culture, the women).
adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Bring the 'trembling' of the women into the 'trembling' of the current congregation.
voorbeeldzinnen: You are standing before the empty tomb today.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The balance is actually quite good; the imperative is properly grounded.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Keep the grounding but make the indicative more performative.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A theologically robust sermon that successfully avoids the 'spring' trap, though it lingers slightly too long in the 'talking about' phase before reaching the 'proclaiming to' phase.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SAT identifies that the preacher isn't just sending a 'message' about Easter, but is acting as a 'witness' whose words aim to be a 'gift of faith'.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: The power here isn't in the flower imagery, but in the illocutionary force of the Scriptural 'Toezegging' (Promise).
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that the preacher's self-identification as a 'witness' at the end is her most performative moment, shifting the sermon from a lecture to an act.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: The decree has been set aside in Christ.
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: This is the turning point where the sermon becomes an event.

appendices.notities: The preacher's use of 'I' is very effective in establishing the 'witness' persona, which is a specific type of illocutionary stance.
